item.title: C# for stupid
item.author: pavel.polushkin@gmail.com (Pavel Polushkin)
item.description: Толковый учебник на русском C# для маленьких и тупых Youtube Microsoft tutorial С# concepts How to create MVC web app How to creaate web API app

item.title: Setup dotNet environment
item.author: pavel.polushkin@gmail.com (Pavel Polushkin)
item.description: install dotnet create app dotnet new console -o myApp run app cd myApp; dotnet run install Visual Studio Code install C# for Visual Studio Code extension by Microsoft install C# Extensions extension In case of issue add a file omnisharp.json into project root. Now you can debug. omnisharp.json { "MsBuild": { "UseLegacySdkResolver": true } } if navigation to declaration is not working Use ctrl-shift-P and select “OmniSharp: Select Project” to select the correct project.

item.title: Implement Azure Security
item.author: pavel.polushkin@gmail.com (Pavel Polushkin)
item.description: Documentation Azure AD main page todo! Auth scenarios Microsoft Graph: MFA Managed identities Key Vault Topics: Implement authentication implement authentication by using certificates, forms-based authentication, or tokens implement multi-factor or Windows authentication by using Azure AD implement OAuth2 authentication implement Managed Service Identity (MSI)/Service Principal authentication Implement access control implement CBAC (Claims-Based Access Control) authorization implement RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) authorization create shared access signatures Implement secure data solutions encrypt and decrypt data at rest and in transit create, read, update, and delete keys, secrets, and certificates by using the KeyVault API

item.title: Develop IAS
item.author: pavel.polushkin@gmail.com (Pavel Polushkin)
item.description: Implement solutions that use virtual machines (VM) Provision VMs Azure VM Linux VM azure cli Create ARM templates Azure Resource Manager overview* Understand the structure and syntax of Azure Resource Manager templates* Template best practices Configure Azure Disk Encryption for VMs Disk encription ovetview Prerequisites Turn encription on Implement batch jobs by using Azure Batch Services Manage batch jobs by using Batch Service API Main page How it works *
